TITLE: Recording Significant Course Insights
DEF: Documentation of significant moments of understanding
TASK: The Significant Course Insight Recording pattern motivates students to document key learnings, realizations, and questions arising during a course. The pattern aims to spur deeper engagement with the material and stimulate critical thinking. It tackles common challenges like information overload and lack of reflection. Students can employ various formats, such as journals, blogs, or audio recordings, to capture their insights and monitor their learning progress.
